title: user-account-extended-properties-dictionary
description: A dictionary captures a set of key/value pairs

^unix-account-ext$.description: The User Account Object defines the following extensions. In addition to these, producers MAY create their own.

gid.description: Specifies the primary group ID of the account.

groups.description: Specifies a list of names of groups that the account is a member of.

home_dir.description: Specifies the home directory of the account.
